name: Carbink
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It’s occasionally found during the excavation of caves.

abilities.name: Energy Keeper
abilities.effect: Basic Energy attached to your Basic Pokémon can’t be discarded by effects of your opponent’s attacks, Abilities, or Trainer cards.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
